name: Salomon S/Pro 100 Ski Boots - Men's
description: If comfort is your first priority, these boots have a heat-customizable shell and liner. With a stiff fibreglass frame, they're responsive and nimble so you can chase perfect turns and boost performance in every corner of the mountain. Adjustable flex lets you tailor the stiffness. Plus, the S/Pro boots are the most comfortable Salomon has ever crafted, so you'll ski better because nothing holds you back.Polyurethane shell with fibreglass framing transfers power efficiently to your ski.Coreframe 360 allows customization of the shell, cuff and liner.Shell can be thermo-moulded for personalized performance.Seamless liner can be thermo-moulded for a refined custom fit.4 aluminum micro-adjust buckles secure your foot in a snug fit.35 mm strap adds extra support at the top of the cuff.Adjustable flex lets you tweak the boot's stiffness.Oversized pivot transfers power smoothly.Medium width in a 100 mm last.Alpine soles and GripWalk-ready.
